statement.p: Vasya's initial salary is 51600. If she receives a raise of 3500 each year, what is the first year her salary is greater (or equal to) 100,000?

solution.p: Her salary must increase more than 100,000-51600 = 48400. This will take \displaystyle\frac{{48400}}{{3500}}={13.828571428571} years. Because she won't be more than 100,000 until the final, full year that is 14 years.
